author: Hemsley + Hemsley
method: Blend all of the ingredients and 300ml/10½fl oz water together in a food processor until super-smooth and well combined. Transfer the mixture to a pan and warm over a gentle heat. Serve immediately in mugs.
ingredients: 2 tbsp carob (available from health food stores),  1 tsp vanilla extract,  ½ tsp almond extract,  1-2 tsp date syrup (available from delicatessens or online specialists) or maple syrup,  1-2 tsp maca powder (optional; available from health food stores),  ¼ tsp salt,  400g tin full-fat coconut milk
